title: Ticket #1580: Fix some generic ads from daemons
description: A few daemons send generic ads to the collector with a MyType of Generic and a TargetType with their actual type. They should be setting MyType to their actual type. Some clients query the collector expecting this TargetType setup. They likewise need to change.
remarks:
2010-Aug-16 11:39:07 by jfrey:
Pushed changes to master for 7.5.4.
check_ins:
2010-Aug-16 11:34   Check-in [18800]: Fix client queries for generic ads #1580 Some clients querying for generic ads expected the ads to have MyType of Generic and TargetType containing the real ad type. Daemons that advertise generic ads use MyType for the real type. Clients now expect that pattern. [...] (By Jaime Frey )
2010-Aug-16 11:34   Check-in [18799]: Fix daemons to use generic ads properly #1580 A few daemons send generic ads to the collector with a MyType of Generic and a TargetType with their actual type. They should be setting MyType to their actual type. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
